original_text: Saul chose three thousand men from Israel; two thousand were with him at Mikmash and in the hill country of Bethel, and a thousand were with Jonathan at Gibeah in Benjamin. The rest of the men he sent back to their homes.
korean_text: 이스라엘 사람 삼천 명을 택하여 그 중에서 이천 명은 자기와 함께 믹마스와 벧엘 산에 있게 하고 일천 명은 요나단과 함께 베냐민 기브아에 있게 하고 남은 백성은 각기 장막으로 보내니라

sentences.original_text: Saul chose three thousand men from Israel
two thousand were with him at Mikmash
sentences.korean_translation: 이천 명은 미스마에서 그와 함께 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and in the hill country of Bethel
and a thousand were with Jonathan
The rest of the men he sent back to their homes
